lines: Don't you just love the shimmer of the shores, the whistling of the wind and the warmth of the sun...
Its quite peaceful out here yeah
What's this temple here all about?
I'm just a simple farmer here, but from what I know it was constructed many hundreds of years ago for the deities of the natural elements
The natural elements in this world are Earth, Water, Fire, Air and the thing that binds them all Luck!
Oh interesting I didn't know luck was one

As much as I love books, I just couldn't stay cooped up in that lounge all day, just look at how nice mother nature is. The Black team really should stop sneering anytime a suggestion of going outside is mentioned :( That captain just doesn't listen!
The Blue team's air conditioning is just too cold, I've gone purple! Its a lot warmer outside!
You know what I'm not going in that lounge ever again!
I know and I plan on sticking to i...wait where's my snack? Oh no I left it in the Blue team lounge O.O
Look how the reeds sway in the water, listen to the chirping of birds and waving of flowers in the wind...
Now this is something worth painting!
You should try fishing it teaches you great patience as you wait for a catch
Maybe, though I probably don't have too much time for that
Well when you do go really savour the moment!
You should give it a try, good exercise and it improves your hand-eye coordination
Here take some of my stones no charge!
(Why would I pay for stones anyways?)
